xwikidoc.content:
1 Compare documents #if($request.page) #set($page = $request.page) #else #set($page = "XWiki.ArticleClass") #end #set($pageuri = $page.replace(".","/")) #set($url1 = "http://staging.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Admin/GetContent?page=${page}&basicauth=1") #set($url2 = "http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Admin/GetContent?page=${page}&basicauth=1") #set($content1 = $xwiki.getURLContent($url1, "LudovicDubost", "toto").replaceAll("\n","").replaceAll("\r","")) #set($content2 = $xwiki.getURLContent($url2, "LudovicDubost", "toimoilui").replaceAll("\n","").replaceAll("\r","")) $content1.length() $content2.length() History1 History1
#if($content1.equals($content2)) Contenu identique #else Le contenu est different {code:xml} $content1 {code} {code:xml} $content2 {code} #end
